name: Maura Healey
tweet: At the time, Eonsmoke‚Äôs products contained some of the highest nicotine concentrations on the market. We‚Äôre holding vape companies accountable for creating and profiting from the youth vaping epidemic. And we will continue to go after companies preying on kids for profits.

name: Maura Healey
tweet: Eonsmoke preyed on young people. The company's social media marketing featured young influencers and memes that encouraged youth to buy vapes and hide them from their parents. For years, Eonsmoke didn't age verify online purchasers, selling to kids as young as 15.

name: Maura Healey
tweet: TODAY: We settled our case against Eonsmoke for $51 million. Eonsmoke intentionally targeted young people on social media and then sold dangerous addictive vaping products directly to kids in our state. We stopped this company from doing business in Massachusetts.  https://t.co/656RzOIJeA
